reviews.review: Moim zdaniem gra świetna, która się nie starzeje i nadal gra się w nią tak samo dobrze jak kiedyś. Polecam!

un très bon jeu l'histoire est génial et c'est ma saga préféré. quand j'ai regardé pour les chapitre je me suis dis que ça allais être long mais non le gros point négatif c'est le temps car au début des tests on voit ??/19 mais le problème c'est qu'il y a seulement 19 tests (sauf pour les derniers qui sont long et ont plusieurs salles) et la difficulté augement plutôt rapidement (au bout du test 10 environ). testez ce jeu car il est vraiment bien (même si je sais qu'on a pas les même goût de jeu) et comme marqué environ 4h de jeu et pour 10€ c'est beaucoup donc prenez la orange box c'est pas mal c'est ce que j'ai pris. je note ce jeu 16/20.
A classic game that every gamer should try.
Ein wahres Meisterwerk! Es setzt mehr auf Rätsel und kombiniert es mit einer guten Geschichte
muito bom vale apena comprar

REVIEW:

Portal ist ein Rätselspiel bei dem die Entwickler sich Gedanken machten um ein neuartiges Gameplay zu schaffen.
Die Portalgun ist eine tolle Idee und wird in jedem Abschnitt des Spiel gut eingebunden die "Testräume" nehmen bis Kammer 10 den Spieler an der Hand und sorgen dafür das man eine Grundidee vom Gameplay bekommt.
Das  Konzept ist Klasse und die müstig um den Computer Glados und Aperture Science ist genial.
Das Spiel ist eine klare Empfehlung für Fans des Genres aber auch für neueinsteiger der spaß wird durch die kürze zwar ein wenig gedrückt dafür gibt es den Nachfolger.

2017夏促和2代一起入的，真的千值万值，开发人员脑洞大开的付出对得起你掏的钱。单机已经可以让你很快乐了，但创意工坊佳作的联机更让你发掘出新的快乐。建议与小伙伴一起入，剧情就玩单机吧，联机就进创意工坊的实验室，会让你开动脑筋，来一次头脑风暴！
单机剧情你可以从场景了解到很多背景，就是一个人在里面比较孤独和略微的压抑，不过通关之后你还是会觉得很有成就感。
非常有意思的一个游戏 结尾的STILL ALIVE更是好听
Now i have two reviews
great game

I dig it, but I was expecting  a little bit more after almost 10 years of wanting to play this game,but still a relly cool game.

EDIT - after beating the game my opinion about it became better.
well worth the 30 cents i payed for it xddddd
Masterpiece.

Ну что тут говорить портал есть портал, прорыв в игровой индустрии переносить игрока таким способ это же п"""ц каким надо было быть креативным, что бы придумать это. Стати не ожидал что так быстро пройду.

第一次玩这类解密游戏，还是有点懵逼。五个小时里看了三次攻略，惭愧惭愧。但玩到后来就感觉像一个恐怖游戏，只有一个人的实验室和工厂墙壁上诡异的涂鸦，给人一种莫名的压抑感。而上一次有过这种感觉，还是在HALO1的圣堂里……
总的来说，这绝对是一款极富有创新思想的游戏，让我第一次知道“脑洞大开”原来可以这样写……
Esta demas pero para no perder la linda costumbre 10/10 :3 aunque en realidad me parece 8/10 pero creo que el problema radica en que me he tirado primero el 2

퍼즐 게임을 좋아하신다면 추천합니다. 퍼즐 게임의 특성상 자세한 리뷰를 할 수는 없지만 고려하시면 좋을 것 같은 부분만 리뷰하겠습니다.

1. 3D멀미가 있으시다면 한번 더 고려하시고 구매결정을 내리셨으면 좋겠습니다. 특히 한번에 클리어하시는 것을 좋아하신다면 더욱 중요합니다. 물론 세이브 기능이 있기에 굳이 한번에 클리어하실 필요는 없지만 플레이 시간동안 계속 화면에 집중하실 경우 피로감이 상당할 수 있습나다.

2. 저는 모르고 게임했지만 스토리의 세계관이 다른 게임과 연결되어있다고 합니다. 하프라이프라는 게임이라고 하는데, 하프라이프를 알지 못하더라도 스토리를 이해하는데에는 지장이 없습니다. 다만 하프라이프를 플레이하셨다면 이를 생각하며 플레이하시면 좋을 것 같습니다.

Nie muszę pisać, że ta gra jest zaje***ta! Ta fabuła, uciekanie, testy, aż chce się grać :)
I nie muszę mówić, że ta część jest ZDECYDOWANIE krótsza od drugiej, ale, jeżeli chcecie zagrać w dwójkę, to najpierw w jedynkę, bo nic nie zrozumiecie :)

Best puzzle game in history,
Plus the story is incredible.

What's there to say about this classic game? I got this for 3RMB ($0.4) during the summer sale since I had some extra money to spend at the end of the sale and I was not disapointed with it. Initially, I held it off for about 1 or 2 weeks so that I could find to right time to play it as I already had high expectations for it and that decision paid off. I played it one afternoon, long after the sale had ended, in an air conditioned room all alone with headphones and had one of the best times of my life. Moving away from the sentimental value of it, I enjoyed the puzzles and the gameplay of Portal and just like most valve games, even though some may perceive it as just another puzzle game, it has its own unique story and twists. I highly recommend it however I feel cheated as I did not get my well-deserved cake in the end
Видимо у Вальв бзик на пушки, творящие всякую дич. Портал-пушка. Грави-пушка. Что дальше?
Would recommend.
令人惊叹的游戏，精巧的游戏设定，值得回味的剧情，必须满分！

Every video game should be this much fun! I purchased this for peanuts during a Steam sale, and have enjoyed it much more than many games (and movies) I have paid at full price. Imaginative puzzles, creepy atmosphere and storyline, together with simple gaming principles allowing you to achieve complex goals, all help to make this a true gem of video gaming wizardry. Its only drawback- it is a bit short. Otherwise, you should do yourself a favor and buy this game, and spend an afternoon to complete it at your pace. I can't wait to play Portal 2!

P.S. The cake is a lie.

If you are looking for a short game to play with an immersive story Portal is definitely one to try. I beat the game in less than 2 hours on my first play through and will most likely be going back to it in the future.

La verdad siempre me preguntaba porque la gente le gusta portal. ya que lo temine y voy por portal 2, ahora si me doy cuenta lo que siente la gente al pedir un "Portal 3", en resumen un juegazo de puzzles increible. 

He de decir que las horas de juego dependen de como te lo tomes, en mi caso me tomo 3.1 horas en terminarlo.

Yes it's short, but it's still one of the best games ever made, and I don't state that lightly. Essentially it's a physics puzzle game played thorugh a FPS perspective. The game looks and sounds good, also runs fairly well. The story is surprisingly decent, thanks to GLaDOS and the infamous cake. The puzzles are fairly accessible, never had to use a walkthrough in this one, and still got a rush from figuring out some of the latter puzzles. I don't have anything to complain here, do play it, it's a must for everyone.

This is a fun and interesting puzzle game, with some humorous elements. However, the game takes only 3 hours to complete, which, is too short for $10.99 Canadian in my opinion. I would say it's only worth buying on sale. Although I did enjoy this game, I think it is a bit overrated, especially for it's price.

I also think its pretty stupid how Portal's community and fans are literally so obsessed with the game, they mark every single negative review with 'not helpful'. Its as if everyone loves this game so much, they can't accept it when others don't.
Exellent jeu, tout simplement une tuerie sur presque tout les points (même si le jeu date un peu)

This game did something other FPS didnt.
 Usual FPS follow the format of " Here is a gun,shoot bad guys,and win" ,but Portal was different.
 The game follows the adventures of a test subject named Chell,in the Aperature Labs,the only one that survived the attack of a robot named "GLaDOS",which guides you in the begining of the game.
 Portal has different puzzles,using different items,lasers,cubes,etc,and every puzzle can be done in different ways.
 But in all of the rooms you will use a tool named "The Portal Gun",that will create two portals ,giving you the abbility of traveling from one to the other.
 The puzzles are sometimes easy,sometimes HARD AF.
 You will be guided by "GLaDOS"in every one of the puzzles,but she is not your typical"learn to do that,boom"guide,she will make fun of you,a lot,and at one point will try to kill you,changing the protagonists mission to killing her and escaping.
 The voice and personality of "GLaDOS" are really well made,making one of the best antagonists in gaming.
 The game dosent lack comedy,especially dark comedy.
 Portal has its easter eggs,hidden,some of them being really creepy ,like Doug Rattman.
 Even the last and the only boss is well made,not going to spoil more.
 The cutest things in the game are the turrets,the only cute thing .
 The end credits had a really good song.
 You wont regret buying this game.
Antes de jogar este jogo eu não estava com expetativas quaisqueres, mas após jogá-lo, meu amigo, tornou-se um dos meus jogos favoritos, uma obra prima. Mais que Recomendado.

This game is amazing!  It is challenging, fun, and extremely unique. It has a good story line and was fun even after the third time playing it. My only complaint is that I finished the game in 4 hours, but it had a replability that kept me playing for hours. 10 out of 10.

Я прошел всю игру в захлёб и вот, что хочу сказать. Гемлей 10/10 игра отлично справляесся со своим жанром головоломка, но хочу заметьтить для тех кто пришол за ооооооочень сложными головоломками будет немного разочарован , игра уникальна в своём жанре и кстати головолмки не заставляют вас вопить от однообразия, и это прекрасно! Видно , что это хоть тест Valve, но они искрине старались и за это им большое спасибо! Сюжет 10/10 не буду спойрелить , а скажу о том,  что после прохождение игры можно отрыть некие тайны игры самому и это изумительно! Графика 10/10  игра вышла в 2007! Тогда она смотрелость годно, да и сейчас смотрется норм! Длительность игры небольшая, как я и писал ранее , что это был тест  игра у меня заняла 2.8 часов. Тут первый и последний минус игры для  стран СНГ игра стоит 249 рублей! Во первых она слишком довно вышла, а во вторых это тест а не игра! Я купил на летней расподаже комлект из двух частей ( на момент написанея обзора я прошёл обе части ) за 49 рублей. Так вот купить можно и не по скидке не пожелеете.

Primero este juego se me hacia muy original, con controles mal optimizados, ya que voy en la misión de cámara 18, no me pasa de [spoiler] la zona donde se encuentran los bot francotiradores [/spoiler] por mas que juego esa parte, el juego se entorpece más, [spoiler] primero alcanzaba a recoger el cubo para bajar a la zona donde esta el botón del interior de esa zona para regresar a donde se necesita, conforme más intentaba, el juego me borraba uno de los portales, bloqueandome el paso y además permitiendo que en toda esa zona me llegará el daño de los bots (es obvio que hay puntos pequeños donde comúnmente uno se puede cubrir, hasta ahí me llegaba el daño después de intentar varias veces), después de un rato vuelvo a intentar y de antes que alcanzaba a avanzar con el cubo, ahora durante el salto me eliminaban [/spoiler]. En un  principio este juego no se me hacia ni bueno ni malo, ya que por un lado, solo controlar por teclado y ratón este juego se es muy lento en cuanto a para poder hacer un nuevo portal durante saltos o cambios de zonas y sentir a este juego que le faltaba algo, sin embargo, lo rescataba lo de ser un juego original; sin embargo tras el problema durante el último nível ya lo  que era positivo se quedo muy escaso contra la jugabilidad muy mala.
Espero que eal menos la secuela no este tan mala como esta, ya que los compré en la oferta pasada

虽然几年前我先玩完了二代，到现在才补玩一代，但仍然觉得这游戏真棒。当然，不能用二代的标准去要求它。

为什么叫传送门？因为它是一个需要思考的游戏，一个需要用传送枪的游戏，它彻底打破了FPS必须拿枪的观念。
    传送门系列乃人生装逼之首选，因为在你室友看来，即使是熟悉的第一人称单机，他（她）也会一时半会看不懂，WOC!一个世界里为啥还有一个世界？这是要走多少道门才能通关啊？你咋跑上面了？
    一代主角Chell和弗里曼大哥一样沉默[strike] 天生一对	[/strike]，一代的剧情可以说是基本没啥，用一句话概括，主角Chell从开始测试直到自己发现了GLaDOS想通置她于死地的阴谋后决定逃跑并最终机智的使用GLaDOS牌导弹破坏了GLaDOS自己。但在结局却令人意外的出现了GLaDOS一直提到的那个蛋糕，不管那个蛋糕是否是GLaDOS为Chell准备的，都说明了GLaDOS没有欺骗她，那个蛋糕确实存在，我在当时看见这一幕时不禁对"大快人心"的结局突然感到莫名其妙的伤感。
    总之，传送门在我看来是我玩过最有新意的游戏了，它甚至超越了半条命2，因为它改变了我的思考和操作方式。

Clever and concise puzzler with just enough humor, heft, and gravitas to become something special.

With your trusty portal gun and little else, you'll navigate through a set of 'tests' organized by GLaDOS; the sentient AI that appears to have imprisoned you within a vast laboratory...and may have dubious plans for your future. 

At least there's cake to look forward to...right? 

Each room builds on your previous experiences, and manages to guide you towards the solution without spelling it out. You'll likely be stumped on occasion, but never for long enough to become frustrated.

Even better, many of the puzzles are deliciously open-ended, allowing for multiple solutions. Case in point: On replaying one of the larger stages, I suddenly realized that I could bypass the entire challenge and get straight to the exit with a single sets of portals and a running jump...ha!

By the way: I've seen some complaints about the length of this game -- because, after all, any game worth its salt should contain dozens -- nay, hundreds! --  of hours of gameplay.

Personally, I couldn't disagree more, and wish we could see more games like this -- short, focused experiences without feature creep or filler. 

Highly recommended (and don't miss the sequel -- from what I've played, it's even better than the first).

9/10

Beynin sınırlarını zorlayan bir oyun. Fakat çok kısa. 15 saatte oyunun tamamını bitirdim. Puzzle tarzı oyunları seviyorsanız şiddetle almanızı öneririm. Ben ORANGE BOX ile birlikte bundle şeklinde aldım ve diğer oyunu oynamak için sabırsızlanıyorum. Almanızı kesinlikle tavsiye ederim!

Pretty good game, also pretty light game. If you have a low end system I reccomend this game, however I do not use a low end system as my main PC but I do have one lying around. This game is pretty fun and is lightweight on most hardware. The puzzles are challenging and that's what I like with a game. Challenging. This game is pretty fun. I like the parts where the game requires you to do a lot within a short amount of time, such as at the end of Test Chamber 15 where you have to be quick about getting the energy pellet into it's receptacle. I like this game, I have yet to complete it but I am fascinated with it. This game may be old, as I was only around 4 years old when it was released. But I am still intrigued with this game.
Очень хорошая игра,не успевает надоесть.

I had a lot of hours on the cracked version of the game , I used to play everyday Portal when I was a kid because I loved the concept and I installed a lot of mods and skins and never got bored even if it was to short and easy.

I bought it only cuz' it was summer sale and very cheap.    Still a great game even today , I totally recommend if you not played the game yet.

10/10

순간이동이 되는 포탈을 열어서 방을 탈출하는 방식의 게임입니다. 방탈출 퍼즐이 쉬우면서도 약간의 두뇌를 써야 해서 사람의 도전욕구를 자극시켜 줍니다. 그런데 또 너무 어려운 퍼즐은 없어서 공략을 보지 않아도 깰 수 있어서 참 적절한 난이도라고 할 수 있습니다. 더더욱 게임에 몰두하게 해줍니다.

L'histoire est bonne, assez courte mais je me suis bien éclater et je pense fortement a jouer a Portal 2 car j adore l'univer et l'ambiance du jeu, pour ma part je ne recommande pas Portal car pour 10euro on a meilleurs temps de prendre Portal 2
